description: DNS Tunneling C2 Communication detected. Abnormal DNS query pattern detected from workstation LAPTOP-FIN-087. Host generated 342 DNS queries to suspicious domain data-exfil-server.tk within 2 minutes exhibiting characteristics of DNS tunneling for command and control communication. Query subdomains contain Base64-encoded data suggesting data exfiltration. Domain has low reputation score and was registered 3 days ago. Firewall blocked subsequent connections after DNS sinkhole activation.
